doctor.name: Dr. Refaz Uddin
doctor.specialty: Cardiology (Heart Diseases, Hypertension, Rheumatic Fever) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Refaz Uddin is a Cardiologist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Cardiology). He is an Assistant Professor, Cardiology at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Refaz Uddin at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia is 3pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu), 9am to 3pm (Friday).

chamber.address: Sono Tower, College Mor, Court Para, Kushtia
